text: Eric R Holroyd (1916–2005) was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Cycling career== Holroyd represented England in the cycling road race at the 1950 British Empire Games in Auckland, New Zealand. ==Personal life== He was the first member of the team to arrive in Auckland because he wished to live in New Zealand and arrived under the assisted immigration scheme. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2005 deaths Category:English male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1950 British Empire Games
title: Eric Holroyd
